title: Australian diary. No. 083
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: members of the Cliff Rescue Squad receive hard training for their hazardous work; the development of the automobile industry is a higlight in Australian progress; Queensland’s Gold Coast with its surf beaches and warm sunshine is developing as a Pacific playground.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
